Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Fixed track switching;
- Fixed player paused in background;
- Added song scrubbing to the lock screen in iOS 10;

- Support of PowerDrive;
- Audio Equalizer;
- Support of OPUS file format;
- Automatic synchronisation of music library;
- 24 bit audio;
- Reduced size of album covers;
- Fixed 2 seconds at the end of audio file during playback;
- Fixed performance and battery usage;

User interface fixes.
General application perfomance fixes.
Fixed "Unable to play music" message.
Fixed Yandex.Disk authorization.
Fixed 2 step verification for MEGA cloud service.
Fixed OneDrive upload operation.

New features:
CarPlay.
VoiceOver.
iCloud Drive.

Fixes:
Fixed user interface issues.
Fixed audio player queue.
Fixed FLAC streaming from Windows Media Server.
Fixed authorization for MEGA cloud storage.
Fixed songs playback.
Fixed localization issues;
Fixed connection for Windows 10 and DLNA.
Fixed now playing song in edit mode.
Fixed audio bookmarks.
Fixed album artworks.

New Features:
Ogg Vorbis file format;
Player queue;
Mini player view;
iPad full screen player view;
Repeat stop option;
Passcode protection;
Artist albums;
Rewind and fast forward timeout;
Open in and tags editor for online files;
Confirmation alert for all files delete operations;
Each song on the playlist can be quickly pushed to the top of the list;
New themes;
Language selection;
Changing number of items per page;
Removed full screen banner;

Fixes:
Fixed performance;
Fixed player buffering;
Fixed music library scanning;
Fixed unable to add second Google Drive account;
Fixed invalid certificates;
Fixed pCloud connection;
Fixed when I start a playlist in random mode it always start with the same song;
Fixed songs sorting in music library;
Fixed equalizer issues;
Fixed localization issues;

Added DLNA support. Now you can connect any personal cloud storage that supports DLNA technology. Application will scan your NAS and all supported audio files will appear on your device.

Fixed Wi-Fi Drive upload issues.
Added playback speed control for Google Cromecast.
Fixed user interface for devices with large screen size.

We constantly update Flacbox to provide the best user experience for you.

In this version we fixed issues you reported in emails. And we also added new buttons on the lock screen of your device. Now there is no need to open the application if you want skip song for few seconds or create audio bookmark. All these actions available on the lock screen of your device. We also fixed issues with GOOGLE_DRIVE and ONE_DRIVE cloud services and improved user interface.

Hi everyone,
in this update we processed thousands of your emails and implemented new features you asked for.

1. Added CUE and M3U playlists. Now you can start audio player with external playlists in CUE or M3U format.
2. Added support for DFF and APE audio formats.
3. Added ‘Audio output sample rate’ in application settings so now you can connect your external DAC and get the best sound quality.
4. Added possibility to import external files located on your device to the music library without copying them to the application.
5. Added support for album artworks located in the music folder. Now you can put album artwork to the music folder and application will find and use it.
6. Fixed some stereo audio files were played in mono mode.
7. Fixed streaming to Apple TV.
8. Fixed sorting by disk number.
9. Fixed embedded album artworks not showing in the app.
10. Fixed MYCLOUDHOME connection problems.

Hi everyone,
in this update we processed thousands of your emails and implemented new features you asked for.

1. Added CUE and M3U playlists. Now you can start audio player with external playlists in CUE or M3U format.
2. Added support for DFF and APE audio formats.
3. Added ‘Audio output sample rate’ in application settings so now you can connect your external DAC and get the best sound quality.
4. Added possibility to import external files located on your device to the music library without copying them to the application.
5. Added support for album artworks located in the music folder. Now you can put album artwork to the music folder and application will find and use it.
6. Fixed some stereo audio files were played in mono mode.
7. Fixed streaming to Apple TV.
8. Fixed sorting by disk number.
9. Fixed embedded album artworks not showing in the app.
10. Fixed MYCLOUDHOME connection problems.
